name: Hats Off (holymahogany)
description:
A short hat-stacking puzzle platformer made in puzzlescript.

Controls:
arrow keys to move
r to restart, z to undo
x to put on a hat

What to expect:
10 main levels plus a couple introductory levels and an outro.

Inspired by:
https://thinkycollective.itch.io/indiana-hat-and-the-temple-of-puzz
https://toombler.itch.io/that-gravity-glow
